Articles.Content:
Guys, guys. I got bored... and made an oboe. Based on my Yamaha YOB-241.

All the keys are accurate

![8TWHG10.png](http://i.imgur.com/8TWHG10.png)

![AAZG5vm.png](http://i.imgur.com/AAZG5vm.png)

![xkj2UrB.png](http://i.imgur.com/xkj2UrB.png)

![KOqASbL.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/KOqASbL.jpg)

It woundn't be on the spacecraft exchange without having rockets would it?

![ncxrMoU.png](http://i.imgur.com/ncxrMoU.png)

[http://www./download/f8dvm6pwaa97j83/Oboe.craft](http://www./download/f8dvm6pwaa97j83/Oboe.craft)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-29T00:00:03Z" title="03/29/2015 12:00  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 29, 2015</time> by xoknight**
i guess those kerbals arnt just whistlin dixie anymore.
You. Made. A. Space. OBOE. You are amazing.
Good, good. Now make a French Horn. It is the greatest instrument. With the exception of bagpipes. No instrument can surpass the divine qualities of the bagpipes.
Nah percussion is the best. LOL this is awesome XD. I have a feeling a pair of drum sticks wouldn't make the most impressive craft though...

> 
> Nah percussion is the best. LOL this is awesome XD. I have a feeling a pair of drum sticks wouldn't make the most impressive craft though...

Fly an entire space drum kit! You could smash a pair of Space Drumsticks into the snare drum at 50 m/s! (Of course, neither drum nor sticks would survive, and it actually wouldn't make sound in space... *but who cares?*)

I would very much like to see this, now.

Oh, and I'll maybe start work on a Space Violin. Because why not.

FLY A CLARINET!

My R-13 deserves some love!

Excellent, we need more classical instruments in space!

Now... build me a pipe organ.

Hey, the oboe actually plays! Sure, fire comes out and it shoots into the air, but it plays, right?

-Carlpilot ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
